==Content==
{{Dialogue Start}}
===Greetings===
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Yoohoo, greetings from [[Mualani]], the shop owner! Welcome to one of the most renowned watersports shops in the whole of the People of the Springs! If you need anything, just leave a message! Hehe~"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Watersports Products===
:'''Owner's Message:''' "I know ya'll must be dying to know more about our wide range of products, so I've written it all down in advance!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "First of all, let me introduce you to the best item in the whole shop &mdash; my lucky inflatable Puffer swimsuit! It can instantly inflate into a Puffer-themed life preserver, so if swimming isn't your forte, it's a must-have!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Next up, everyone's favorite &mdash; our surfboards! Whatever color, material, or design you want, we've got you covered! And even if we haven't got exactly what you're looking for, you can always customize your own!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "And it goes without saying, we've also got everything for water-skiing, parasailing, beach volleyball, and more! There's too much to list out here, so feel free to come ask me in person!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Sharky Surfboard Warning===
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Just please, unless you're an experienced surfer, steer clear of our Sharky Surfboards!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "When it comes to speed, Sharky Surfboards blow regular ones out of the water, but they're much harder to control..."
:'''Owner's Message:''' "If you're not careful, you might end up crashing head-first into a reef!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "And if you're unlucky enough to pick up an injury, you'll waste precious vacation time laid up in bed recovering &mdash; definitely not a risk worth taking!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Missing Mualani===
:'''Owner's Message:''' "If you can't find me, don't panic!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Just head over to the beach volleyball and surfing areas to take a look around."
:'''Owner's Message:''' "If you really can't find me, don't sweat it! I've left a price list on this sign, so just leave your Mora on the counter if you're looking to buy something~"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Dear customers, I trust every single one of you!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)

===Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame===
''Available before completing {{Quest|Into Eternal Night}}''.{{Verify}}
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Wish me luck!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "Mualani, the shop owner, will be representing the People of the Springs in the upcoming [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame|Pilgrimage]]!"
:'''Owner's Message:''' "When I return with a top ranking, I'll throw an awesome event for you guys &mdash; a huge watersports products giveaway!"
:{{DIcon}} Continue Reading
:;(Proceeds to next section)
:{{DIcon}} Leave
:;(Exits dialogue)
{{Dialogue End}}
